com.yazdankhah.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yazdankhah.util.StringUtil

  • public class StringUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some string handling operations that Java does not support directly. Author: Ahmad

      • createCommaSeparatedStrWrapped

        public static java.lang.String createCommaSeparatedStrWrapped(java.lang.String[] valueArr,
                                                              int[] numOrStr)
        make a string of all values of an array separated by comma. It looks at the corresponding numOrStr and if it is 0 means that the value is a String. So, it wrapped it in single quotes.
        Parameters:
        valueArr - - the input array.
        numOrStr -
        Returns:
        - the string of the array values.
